Module contents¶

class qiskit_aqua.algorithms.adaptive.VQE(operator, var_form, optimizer, operator_mode='matrix', initial_point=None, batch_mode=False, aux_operators=None)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.algorithms.quantum_algorithm.QuantumAlgorithm

The Variational Quantum Eigensolver algorithm.

See https://arxiv.org/abs/1304.3061

CONFIGURATION = {'defaults': {'optimizer': {'name': 'L_BFGS_B'}, 'variational_form': {'name': 'RYRZ'}, 'initial_state': {'name': 'ZERO'}}, 'depends': ['optimizer', 'variational_form', 'initial_state'], 'description': 'VQE Algorithm', 'input_schema': {'$schema': 'http://json-schema.org/schema#', 'id': 'vqe_schema', 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'operator_mode': {'type': 'string', 'default': 'matrix', 'oneOf': [{'enum': ['matrix', 'paulis', 'grouped_paulis']}]}, 'initial_point': {'type': ['array', 'null'], 'items': {'type': 'number'}, 'default': None}, 'batch_mode': {'type': 'boolean', 'default': False}}, 'additionalProperties': False}, 'name': 'VQE', 'problems': ['energy', 'ising']}¶
SECTION_KEY_ALGORITHM = 'algorithm'¶
SECTION_KEY_FEATURE_MAP = 'feature_map'¶
SECTION_KEY_INITIAL_STATE = 'initial_state'¶
SECTION_KEY_IQFT = 'iqft'¶
SECTION_KEY_MULTICLASS_EXTENSION = 'multiclass_extension'¶
SECTION_KEY_OPTIMIZER = 'optimizer'¶
SECTION_KEY_ORACLE = 'oracle'¶
SECTION_KEY_UNCERTAINTY_MODEL = 'uncertainty_model'¶
SECTION_KEY_UNCERTAINTY_PROBLEM = 'uncertainty_problem'¶
SECTION_KEY_VAR_FORM = 'variational_form'¶
__init__(operator, var_form, optimizer, operator_mode='matrix', initial_point=None, batch_mode=False, aux_operators=None)[source]¶

Constructor.

Parameters:
  • operator (Operator) – Qubit operator
  • operator_mode (str) – operator mode, used for eval of operator
  • var_form (VariationalForm) – parametrized variational form.
  • optimizer (Optimizer) – the classical optimization algorithm.
  • initial_point (numpy.ndarray) – optimizer initial point.
  • aux_operators ([Operator]) – Auxiliary operators to be evaluated at each eigenvalue

Determine minimum energy state.

Parameters:initial_point (numpy.ndarray[float]) – initial point, or None if not provided.
Returns:Optimized variational parameters, and corresponding minimum eigenvalue.
Raises:ValueError

class qiskit_aqua.algorithms.adaptive.QAOA(operator, optimizer, p=1, operator_mode='matrix', initial_point=None, batch_mode=False, aux_operators=None)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.algorithms.adaptive.vqe.vqe.VQE

The Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm.

See https://arxiv.org/abs/1411.4028

CONFIGURATION = {'defaults': {'optimizer': {'name': 'COBYLA'}}, 'depends': ['optimizer'], 'description': 'Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm', 'input_schema': {'$schema': 'http://json-schema.org/schema#', 'id': 'qaoa_schema', 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'operator_mode': {'type': 'string', 'default': 'matrix', 'oneOf': [{'enum': ['matrix', 'paulis', 'grouped_paulis']}]}, 'p': {'type': 'integer', 'default': 1, 'minimum': 1}, 'initial_point': {'type': ['array', 'null'], 'items': {'type': 'number'}, 'default': None}, 'batch_mode': {'type': 'boolean', 'default': False}}, 'additionalProperties': False}, 'name': 'QAOA.Variational', 'problems': ['ising']}¶

__init__(operator, optimizer, p=1, operator_mode='matrix', initial_point=None, batch_mode=False, aux_operators=None)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • operator (Operator) – Qubit operator
  • operator_mode (str) – operator mode, used for eval of operator
  • p (int) – the integer parameter p as specified in https://arxiv.org/abs/1411.4028
  • optimizer (Optimizer) – the classical optimization algorithm.
  • initial_point (str) – optimizer initial point.

Bases: qiskit_aqua.algorithms.quantum_algorithm.QuantumAlgorithm

__init__(optimizer, feature_map, var_form, training_dataset, test_dataset=None, datapoints=None, batch_mode=False)[source]¶

Initialize the object :param training_dataset: {‘A’: numpy.ndarray, ‘B’: numpy.ndarray, …} :type training_dataset: dict :param test_dataset: the same format as training_dataset :type test_dataset: dict :param datapoints: NxD array, N is the number of data and D is data dimension :type datapoints: numpy.ndarray :param optimizer: Optimizer instance :type optimizer: Optimizer :param feature_map: FeatureMap instance :type feature_map: FeatureMap :param var_form: VariationalForm instance :type var_form: VariationalForm :param batch_mode: Batch mode for circuit compilation and execution :type batch_mode: boolean

Notes

We used label denotes numeric results and class means the name of that class (str).

Construct circuit based on data and paramters in variaitonal form.

Parameters:

  • theta ([numpy.ndarray]) – list of 1-D array, parameters sets for variational form
  • measurement (bool) – flag to add measurement
Returns:

the circuit

label_to_class¶
load_model(file_path)[source]¶
predict(data, quantum_instance=None)[source]¶

Predict the labels for the data.

Parameters:
  • data (numpy.ndarray) – NxD array, N is number of data, D is data dimension
  • quantum_instance (QuantumInstance) – quantum backend with all setting
Returns:

for each data point, generates the predicted probability for each class list: for each data point, generates the predicted label, which with the highest prob
Return type:

[dict]
